original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Buddhavagga
analyzed: buddha vagga

original: 5. Hīnāyāvattanapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, mahantaṁ idaṁ tathāgatasāsanaṁ sāraṁ varaṁ seṭṭhaṁ pavaraṁ anupamaṁ
analyzed: bhante nāgasena mahantam idam tathāgata sāsanam sāram varam seṭṭham pavaram anupama

original: parisuddhaṁ vimalaṁ paṇḍaraṁ anavajjaṁ, na yuttaṁ gihiṁ tāvatakaṁ pabbajetuṁ, gihīyeva
analyzed: parisuddham vimalam paṇḍaram anavajja na yuttam gihim tāvatakam pabbajetu

original: ekasmiṁ phale vinetvā yadā apunarāvattī hoti tadā so pabbājetabbo.
analyzed: ekasmin phale vinetvā yadā apunarāvattī hoti tadā so pabbājetabbo

original: Kiṁ kāraṇā?
analyzed: kim kāraṇā

original: Ime dujjanā tāva tattha sāsane visuddhe pabbajitvā paṭinivattitvā hīnāyāvattanti,
analyzed: ime dujjanā tāva tattha sāsane visuddhe pabbajitvā paṭinivattitvā hīnāya āvattanti

original: tesaṁ paccāgamanena ayaṁ mahājano evaṁ vicinteti ‘tucchakaṁ vata bho etaṁ samaṇassa
analyzed: tesam paccāgamanena ayam mahā janaḥ evam vicinteti tucchakam vata bho etam samaṇassa

original: gotamassa sāsanaṁ bhavissati, yaṁ ime paṭinivattantī’ti, idamettha kāraṇan”ti.
analyzed: gotamassa sāsanam bhavissati yam ime paṭinivattanti iti idam ettha kāraṇam ti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, taḷāko bhaveyya sampuṇṇasucivimalasītalasalilo, atha yo koci kiliṭṭho
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja taḷākaḥ sampuṇṇa suci vimala sītala salilaḥ atha yaḥ koci kiliṭṭhaḥ

original: malakaddamagato taṁ taḷākaṁ gantvā anahāyitvā kiliṭṭhova paṭinivatteyya, tattha,
analyzed: malakaddama gataḥ tam taḷākam gantvā an ahāyitvā kiliṭṭhaḥ uva paṭinivatteyya tattha

original: mahārāja, katamaṁ jano garaheyya kiliṭṭhaṁ vā taḷākaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: mahā rāja katamam janaḥ garaheyya kiliṭṭham vā taḷākam vāti

original: “Kiliṭṭhaṁ, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayaṁ taḷākaṁ gantvā anahāyitvā kiliṭṭhova paṭinivatto, kiṁ imaṁ anahāyitukāmaṁ taḷāko sayaṁ nahāpessati, ko doso taḷākassā’”ti.
analyzed: kiliṭṭha bhante janaḥ garaheyya ayam taḷākam gantvā an ahāyitvā kiliṭṭhaḥ uva paṭinivatto kim imam an ahāyitu kāmam taḷākaḥ sayam nahāpessati kaḥ dosaḥ taḷākassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato vimuttivarasalilasampuṇṇaṁ saddhammavarataḷākaṁ
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja tathāgataḥ vimutti vara salila sampuṇṇam saddhamma vara taḷāka

original: māpesi ‘ye keci kilesamalakiliṭṭhā sacetanā budhā, te idha nahāyitvā sabbakilese pavāhayissantī’ti.
analyzed: mā āpesi ye keci kilesa mala kiliṭṭhā sa cetanā budhā te idha nahāyitvā sabba kilese pavāhayissanti iti

original: Yadi koci taṁ saddhammavarataḷākaṁ gantvā anahāyitvā sakilesova paṭinivattitvā hīnāyāvattati
analyzed: yadi koci tam saddhamma vara taḷākam gantvā an ahāyitvā sa kilesaḥ iva paṭinivattitvā hīnāya avattati

original: taṁyeva jano garahissati ‘ayaṁ jinasāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭhaṁ alabhitvā hīnāyāvatto,
analyzed: tayā iva janaḥ garahissati ayam jina sāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭham a labhitvā hīnāya avattaḥ

original: kiṁ imaṁ appaṭipajjantaṁ jinasāsanaṁ sayaṁ bodhessati, ko doso jinasāsanassā’ti?
analyzed: kim imam appaṭipajjantam jina sāsanam sayam bodhessati kaḥ dosaḥ jina sāsanassa ati

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, puriso paramabyādhito roguppattikusalaṁ amoghadhuvasiddhakammaṁ
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja purisaḥ parama byādhitaḥ roga uppatti kusalam amogha dhuva siddha kamma

original: bhisakkaṁ sallakattaṁ disvā atikicchāpetvā sabyādhikova paṭinivatteyya, tattha katamaṁ
analyzed: bhisakkam sallakattam disvā atikicchā apetvā sabyādhikaḥ uva paṭinivatteyya tattha katama

original: jano garaheyya āturaṁ vā bhisakkaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: janaḥ garaheyyaḥ āturam vā bhisakkam vā ati

original: “Āturaṁ, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayaṁ roguppattikusalaṁ amoghadhuvasiddhakammaṁ bhisakkaṁ
analyzed: ātura bhante janaḥ garaheyya ayam roga uppatti kusalam amogha dhuva siddha kammam bhisakka

original: sallakattaṁ disvā atikicchāpetvā sabyādhikova paṭinivatto, kiṁ imaṁ atikicchāpentaṁ
analyzed: sallakattam disvā atikicchāpetvā sabyādhikaḥ iva paṭinivattaḥ kim imam

original: bhisakko sayaṁ tikicchissati, ko doso bhisakkassā’”ti?
analyzed: bhisakkaḥ sayam tikicchissati kaḥ dosaḥ bhisakkassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato antosāsanasamugge kevalaṁ sakalakilesabyādhivūpasamanasamatthaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ antosāsana samugge kevalam sakala kilesa byādhi vūpasamana samattha

original: amatosadhaṁ pakkhipi, ‘ye keci kilesabyādhipīḷitā sacetanā budhā, te imaṁ amatosadhaṁ
analyzed: amatosadham pakkhipi ye keci kilesa byādhi pīḍitā sa cetanā budhā te imam amatosadha

original: pivitvā sabbakilesabyādhiṁ vūpasamessantī’ti.
analyzed: pivitvā sabba kilesa byādhim vūpasamessanti iti

original: Yadi koci taṁ amatosadhaṁ apivitvā sakilesova paṭinivattitvā hīnāyāvattati, taṁyeva
analyzed: yadi koci tam amatosadham a pivitvā sa kilesaḥ uva paṭinivattitvā hīnāya avattati tayā iva

original: jano garahissati ‘ayaṁ jinasāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭhaṁ alabhitvā hīnāyāvatto,
analyzed: janaḥ garahissati ayam jina sāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭham a labhitvā hīnāya avattaḥ

original: kiṁ imaṁ appaṭipajjantaṁ jinasāsanaṁ sayaṁ bodhessati, ko doso jinasāsanassā’ti?
analyzed: kim imam appaṭipajjantam jina sāsanam sayam bodhessati kaḥ dosaḥ jina sāsanassa ati

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, chāto puriso mahatimahāpuññabhattaparivesanaṁ gantvā taṁ
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja chātaḥ purisaḥ mahati mahā puñña bhatta parivesanam gantvā

original: bhattaṁ abhuñjitvā chātova paṭinivatteyya, tattha katamaṁ jano garaheyya chātaṁ vā puññabhattaṁ vā”ti?
analyzed: bhattam a bhuñjitvā chātaḥ uva paṭinivatteyya tattha katamam janaḥ garaheyya chātam vā puññabhattam vā ati

original: “Chātaṁ, bhante, jano garaheyya ‘ayaṁ khudāpīḷito puññabhattaṁ paṭilabhitvā abhuñjitvā
analyzed: chāta bhante janaḥ garaheyya ayam khudā pīḍitaḥ puñña bhattam paṭilabhitvā a bhuñjitvā

original: chātova paṭinivatto, kiṁ imassa abhuñjantassa bhojanaṁ sayaṁ mukhaṁ pavisissati,
analyzed: chātaḥ uva paṭinivatto kim imassa a bhuñjantassa bhojanam sayam mukham pavisissati

original: ko doso bhojanassā’”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ dosaḥ bhojanassa ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato antosāsanasamugge paramapavaraṁ santaṁ sivaṁ paṇītaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ antosāsana samugge parama pavaram santam sivam paṇīta

original: amataṁ paramamadhuraṁ kāyagatāsatibhojanaṁ ṭhapesi ‘ye keci kilesachātajjhattā taṇhāparetamānasā
analyzed: amatam parama madhuram kāya gata asati bhojanam ṭhapesi ye keci kilesa chāta jjhattā taṇhā pareta mānasā

original: sacetanā budhā, te imaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñjitvā kāmarūpārūpabhavesu sabbaṁ taṇhamapanessantī’ti.
analyzed: sa cetanāḥ budhāḥ te imam bhojanam bhuñjitvā kāmarūpa arūpa bhavesu sabbam taṇham apanessanti iti

original: Yadi koci taṁ bhojanaṁ abhuñjitvā taṇhāsitova paṭinivattitvā hīnāyāvattati, taññeva
analyzed: yadi koci tam bhojanam a bhuñjitvā taṇhā sitaḥ uva paṭinivattitvā hīnāya avattati tañca eva

original: jano garahissati ‘ayaṁ jinasāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭhaṁ alabhitvā hīnāyāvatto,
analyzed: janaḥ garahissati ayam jina sāsane pabbajitvā tattha patiṭṭham a labhitvā hīnāya avattaḥ

original: kiṁ imaṁ appaṭipajjantaṁ jinasāsanaṁ sayaṁ bodhessasi, ko doso jinasāsanassā’ti?
analyzed: kim imam appaṭipajjantam jina sāsanam sayam bodhessasi kaḥ dosaḥ jina sāsanassa ati

original: Yadi, mahārāja, tathāgato gihiṁyeva ekasmiṁ phale vinītaṁ pabbājeyya, na nāmāyaṁ pabbajjā kilesappahānāya visuddhiyā vā, natthi pabbajjāya karaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: yadi mahā rāja tathāgataḥ gihiyā iva ekasmin phale vinītam pabbājeyya na nāma ayam pabbajjā kilesa ppahānāya visuddhiyā vā natthi pabbajjāya karaṇīya

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso anekasatena kammena taḷākaṁ khaṇāpetvā parisāya evamanussāveyya
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ aneka satena kammena taḷākam khaṇāpetvā parisāya evam anussāveyya

original: ‘mā me, bhonto, keci saṅkiliṭṭhā imaṁ taḷākaṁ otaratha, pavāhitarajojallā parisuddhā
analyzed: mā me bhonto keci saṅkiliṭṭhāḥ imam taḷākam pavāhita rajaḥ jallā parisuddhā

original: vimalamaṭṭhā imaṁ taḷākaṁ otarathā’ti.
analyzed: vimala maṭṭhāḥ imam taḷākam otaratha ati

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ pavāhitarajojallānaṁ parisuddhānaṁ vimalamaṭṭhānaṁ tena taḷākena karaṇīyaṁ bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho mahā rāja tesam pavāhita rajaḥ jallānam parisuddhānam vimalam aṭṭhānam tena taḷākena karaṇīyam bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthāya te taṁ taḷākaṁ upagaccheyyuṁ, taṁ aññatreva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ tena taḷākenā”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante yad satthāya te tam taḷākam upagaccheyyu tam aññatra iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam tena taḷākena ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi tathāgato gihiṁyeva ekasmiṁ phale vinītaṁ pabbājeyya, tattheva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ pabbajjāya.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yadi tathāgataḥ gihiyā iva ekasmin phale vinītam pabbājeyya tattha iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam pabbajjāya

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, sabhāvaisibhattiko sutamantapadadharo atakkiko roguppattikusalo
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja sabhā vaisibhattikaḥ suta manta pada dharaḥ atakkikaḥ roga uppatti kusalaḥ

original: amoghadhuvasiddhakammo bhisakko sallakatto sabbarogūpasamabhesajjaṁ sannipātetvā
analyzed: amogha dhuva siddha kammaḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakatto sabba rogūpasama bhesajjam sannipātetvā

original: parisāya evamanussāveyya ‘mā kho, bhonto, keci sabyādhikā mama santike upagacchatha,
analyzed: parisāya evam anussāveyya mā kho bhonto keci sabyādhikāḥ mama santike upagacchatha

original: abyādhikā arogā mama santike upagacchathā’ti.
analyzed: abyādhikāḥ arogāḥ mama santike upagacchatha ati

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ abyādhikānaṁ arogānaṁ paripuṇṇānaṁ udaggānaṁ tena bhisakkena karaṇīyaṁ bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu mahā rāja tesam abyādhikānam arogānam paripuṇṇānam udaggānam tena bhisakkena karaṇīyam bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthāya te taṁ bhisakkaṁ sallakattaṁ upagaccheyyuṁ, taṁ aññatreva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ tena bhisakkenā”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante yad atthāya te tam bhisakkam sallakattam upagaccheyyu tam aññatra iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam tena bhisakkena ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi tathāgato gihiṁyeva ekasmiṁ phale vinītaṁ pabbājeyya, tattheva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ pabbajjāya?
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yadi tathāgataḥ gihiyā iva ekasmin phale vinītam pabbājeyya tattha iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam pabbajjāya

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, koci puriso anekathālipākasataṁ bhojanaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā parisāya
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja koci purisaḥ aneka thāli pāka satam bhojanam paṭiyādāpetvā parisāya

original: evamanussāveyya ‘mā me, bhonto, keci chātā imaṁ parivesanaṁ upagacchatha, subhuttā
analyzed: evam anussāveyya mā me bhontaḥ keci chātāḥ imam parivesanam upagacchatha su bhuttāḥ

original: tittā suhitā dhātā pīṇitā paripuṇṇā imaṁ parivesanaṁ upagacchathā’ti.
analyzed: tittā su hitā dhātā pīṇitā paripuṇṇā imam parivesanam upagacchatha ati

original: Api nu kho, mahārāja, tesaṁ bhuttāvīnaṁ tittānaṁ suhitānaṁ dhātānaṁ pīṇitānaṁ paripuṇṇānaṁ tena bhojanena karaṇīyaṁ bhaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu khalu mahā rāja tesam bhuttāvīnam tittānam su hitānam dhātānam pīṇitānam paripuṇṇānam tena bhojanena karaṇīyam bhaveyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, yassatthāya te taṁ parivesanaṁ upagaccheyyuṁ, taṁ aññatreva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ tāya parivesanāyā”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante yad satthāya te tam parivesanam upagaccheyyu tam aññatra iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam tāya parivesanāya ati

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi tathāgato gihiṁyeva ekasmiṁ phale vinītaṁ pabbājeyya, tattheva tesaṁ kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, kiṁ tesaṁ pabbajjāya?
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yadi tathāgataḥ gihiyā iva ekasmin phale vinītam pabbājeyya tattha iva tesam katam karaṇīya kim tesam pabbajjāya

original: Api ca, mahārāja, ye hīnāyāvattanti, te jinasāsanassa pañca atuliye guṇe dassenti.
analyzed: api ca mahā rāja ye hīnāya avattanti te jina sāsanassa pañca atuliye guṇe dassenti

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Bhūmimahantabhāvaṁ dassenti, parisuddhavimalabhāvaṁ dassenti, pāpehi asaṁvāsiyabhāvaṁ dassenti, duppaṭivedhabhāvaṁ dassenti, bahusaṁvararakkhiyabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: bhūmi mahanta bhāvam dassenti parisuddha vimala bhāvam dassenti pāpehi a savāsiya bhāvam dassenti duppaṭivedha bhāvam dassenti bahu savara rakkhiya bhāvam dassenti

original: Kathaṁ bhūmimahantabhāvaṁ dassenti?
analyzed: katham bhūmi mahanta bhāvam dassenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, puriso adhano hīnajacco nibbiseso buddhiparihīno mahārajjaṁ paṭilabhitvā na cirasseva paripatati paridhaṁsati parihāyati yasato, na sakkoti issariyaṁ sandhāretuṁ.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ adhanaḥ hīna jaccaḥ nibbisesaḥ buddhi parihīnaḥ mahā rajjam paṭilabhitvā na cirassa iva paripatati paridhasati parihāyati yasataḥ na sakkoti issariyam sandhāretu

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Mahantattā issariyassa.
analyzed: mahantattā issariyassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci nibbisesā akatapuññā buddhiparihīnā jinasāsane pabbajanti,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye keci nibbisesāḥ akata puññāḥ buddhi parihīnāḥ jina sāsane pabbajanti

original: te taṁ pabbajjaṁ pavaruttamaṁ sandhāretuṁ avisahantā na cirasseva jinasāsanā paripatitvā
analyzed: te tam pabbajjam pavara uttamam sandhāretum a visahantāḥ na cirassa iva jina sāsanā paripatitvā

original: paridhaṁsitvā parihāyitvā hīnāyāvattanti, na sakkonti jinasāsanaṁ sandhāretuṁ.
analyzed: paridhasitvā parihāyitvā hīnāya avattanti na sakkonti jina sāsanam sandhāretu

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Mahantattā jinasāsanabhūmiyā.
analyzed: mahantattā jina sāsana bhūmiyā

original: Evaṁ bhūmimahantabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: evam bhūmi mahanta bhāvam dassenti

original: Kathaṁ parisuddhavimalabhāvaṁ dassenti?
analyzed: katham parisuddha vimala bhāvam dassenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vāri pokkharapatte vikirati vidhamati vidhaṁseti, na ṭhānamupagacchati nūpalimpati.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vāri pokkharapatte vikirati vidhamati vidhaseti na ṭhānam upagacchati nu upalimpati

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Parisuddhavimalattā padumassa.
analyzed: parisuddha vimala ttā padumassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci saṭhā kūṭā vaṅkā kuṭilā visamadiṭṭhino jinasāsane
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye keci saṭhā kūṭāḥ vaṅkāḥ kuṭilāḥ visama diṭṭhinaḥ jina sāsane

original: pabbajanti, te parisuddhavimalanikkaṇṭakapaṇḍaravarappavarasāsanato na cirasseva
analyzed: pabbajanti te parisuddha vimala nikkaṇṭaka paṇḍara vara ppavara sāsanataḥ na cirassa eva

original: vikiritvā vidhamitvā vidhaṁsetvā asaṇṭhahitvā anupalimpitvā hīnāyāvattanti.
analyzed: vikiritvā vidhamitvā vidhasetvā a saṇṭhahitvā an upalimpitvā hīnāya avattanti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Parisuddhavimalattā jinasāsanassa.
analyzed: parisuddha vimala ttā jina sāsanassa

original: Evaṁ parisuddhavimalabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: evam parisuddha vimala bhāvam dassenti

original: Kathaṁ pāpehi asaṁvāsiyabhāvaṁ dassenti?
analyzed: katham pāpehi asavāsiya bhāvam dassenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṁvasati, yaṁ hoti mahāsamudde mataṁ kuṇapaṁ, taṁ khippameva tīraṁ upaneti thalaṁ vā ussāreti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja mahā samuddaḥ na matena kuṇapena yam hoti mahā samudde matam kuṇapa tam khippam eva tīram upaneti thalam vā ussāreti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Mahābhūtānaṁ bhavanattā mahāsamuddassa.
analyzed: mahābhūtānam bhavanattā mahā samuddassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci pāpakā asaṁvutā ahirikā akiriyā osannavīriyā kusītā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ye keci pāpakāḥ a savutāḥ ahirikāḥ akiriyāḥ osanna vīriyā kusītā

original: kiliṭṭhā dujjanā manussā jinasāsane pabbajanti, te na cirasseva jinasāsanato arahantavimalakhīṇāsavamahābhūtabhavanato
analyzed: kiliṭṭhāḥ dujjanāḥ manussāḥ jina sāsane pabbajanti te na cirassa eva jina sāsanataḥ arahanta vimala khīṇāsava mahābhūta bhavanataḥ

original: nikkhamitvā asaṁvasitvā hīnāyāvattanti.
analyzed: nikkhamitvā a savasitvā hīnāya āvattanti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Pāpehi asaṁvāsiyattā jinasāsanassa.
analyzed: pāpehi a sava asiya ttā jina sāsanassa

original: Evaṁ pāpehi asaṁvāsiyabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: evam pāpehi asavāsiya bhāvam dassenti

original: Kathaṁ duppaṭivedhabhāvaṁ dassenti?
analyzed: katham duppaṭivedha bhāvam dassenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, ye keci achekā asikkhitā asippino mativippahīnā issāsā vālaggavedhaṁ avisahantā vigaḷanti pakkamanti.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja ye keci achekāḥ a sikkhitāḥ a sippinaḥ mati vippahīnāḥ issāsāḥ vā ālagga vedham a visahantāḥ vigaḷanti pakkamanti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Saṇhasukhumaduppaṭivedhattā vālaggassa.
analyzed: saṇha sukhuma duppaṭivedha ttā vā ālaggassa

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci duppaññā jaḷā eḷamūgā mūḷhā dandhagatikā janā jinasāsane
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye keci duppaññāḥ jaḷāḥ eḷamūgāḥ mūḷhāḥ dandha gatikāḥ janāḥ jina sāsane

original: pabbajanti, te taṁ paramasaṇhasukhumacatusaccappaṭivedhaṁ paṭivijjhituṁ avisahantā
analyzed: pabbajanti te tam parama saṇha sukhuma catu sacca ppaṭivedham paṭivijjhitum a visahantā

original: jinasāsanā vigaḷitvā pakkamitvā na cirasseva hīnāyāvattanti.
analyzed: jina sāsanā vigaḷitvā pakkamitvā na cirassa iva hīnāya āvattanti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Paramasaṇhasukhumaduppaṭivedhatāya saccānaṁ.
analyzed: parama saṇha sukhuma duppaṭivedha tāya

original: Evaṁ duppaṭivedhabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: evam duppaṭivedha bhāvam dassenti

original: Kathaṁ bahusaṁvararakkhiyabhāvaṁ dassenti?
analyzed: katham bahu savara rakkhiya bhāvam dassenti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso mahatimahāyuddhabhūmimupagato parasenāya disāvidisāhi samantā parivārito sattihatthaṁ janamupentaṁ disvā bhīto osakkati paṭinivattati palāyati.
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ mahati mahā yuddha bhūmim upagataḥ para senāya disā vidisāhi samantā parivāritaḥ satti hattham janam upentam disvā bhītaḥ osakkati paṭinivattati palāyati

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Bahuvidhayuddhamukharakkhaṇabhayā.
analyzed: bahuvidha yuddha mukha rakkhaṇa bhayā

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye keci pāpakā asaṁvutā ahirikā akiriyā akkhantī capalā calitā
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja ye keci pāpakāḥ a savutāḥ ahirikāḥ akiriyāḥ a khantī capalā calitā

original: ittarā bālajanā jinasāsane pabbajanti, te bahuvidhaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ parirakkhituṁ avisahantā
analyzed: ittarā bāla janāḥ jina sāsane pabbajanti te bahuvidham sikkhāpadam parirakkhitum a visahantā

original: osakkitvā paṭinivattitvā palāyitvā na cirasseva hīnāyāvattanti.
analyzed: osakkitvā paṭinivattitvā palāyitvā na cirassa iva hīnāya āvattanti

original: Kiṅkāraṇaṁ?
analyzed: kiṅkāraṇa

original: Bahuvidhasaṁvararakkhiyabhāvattā jinasāsanassa.
analyzed: bahuvidha savara rakkhiya bhāva ttā jina sāsanassa

original: Evaṁ bahuvidhasaṁvararakkhiyabhāvaṁ dassenti.
analyzed: evam bahuvidha savara rakkhiya bhāvam dassenti

original: Thalajuttamepi, mahārāja, vassikāgumbe kimividdhāni pupphāni honti, tāni aṅkurāni saṅkuṭitāni antarāyeva paripatanti, na ca tesu paripatitesu vassikāgumbo hīḷito nāma hoti.
analyzed: thala juttame pi mahā rāja vassikā gumbe kimi viddhāni pupphāni honti tāni aṅkurāni saṅkuṭitāni antarāya iva paripatanti na ca tesu paripatitesu vassikā gumbaḥ hīḷitaḥ nāma hoti

original: Yāni tattha ṭhitāni pupphāni, tāni sammā gandhena disāvidisaṁ abhibyāpenti.
analyzed: yāni tattha ṭhitāni pupphāni tāni sammā gandhena disāvidisam abhibyāpenti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jinasāsane pabbajitvā hīnāyāvattanti, te jinasāsane
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te jina sāsane pabbajitvā hīnāya avattanti te jina sāsane

original: kimividdhāni vassikāpupphāni viya vaṇṇagandharahitā nibbaṇṇākārasīlā abhabbā vepullāya,
analyzed: vassikā pupphāni viya vaṇṇa gandha rahitāḥ nibbaṇṇa ākāra sīlāḥ abhabbāḥ vepullāya

original: na ca tesaṁ hīnāyāvattanena jinasāsanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: na ca tesam hīnāya āvattanena jina sāsanam hīḷitam nāma hoti

original: Ye tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū, te sadevakaṁ lokaṁ sīlavaragandhena abhibyāpenti.
analyzed: ye tattha ṭhitāḥ bhikkhū te sa devakam lokam sīlavara gandhena abhibyāpenti

original: Sālīnampi, mahārāja, nirātaṅkānaṁ lohitakānaṁ antare karumbhakaṁ nāma sālijāti uppajjitvā antarā yeva vinassati, na ca tassā vinaṭṭhattā lohitakasālī hīḷitā nāma honti.
analyzed: sālīnam pi mahā rāja nirātaṅkānam lohitakānam antare karumbhakam nāma sāli jāti uppajjitvā antarā yeva vinassati na ca tassāḥ vinaṭṭha ttā lohitaka sālī hīḷitāḥ nāma honti

original: Ye tattha ṭhitā sālī, te rājūpabhogā honti.
analyzed: ye tattha ṭhitā sālī te rāja upabhogāḥ honti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jinasāsane pabbajitvā hīnāyāvattanti, te lohitakasālīnamantare
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te jina sāsane pabbajitvā hīnāya avattanti te lohitaka sālīnam antare

original: karumbhakā viya jinasāsane na vaḍḍhitvā vepullataṁ na pāpuṇitvā antarāyeva hīnāyāvattanti,
analyzed: karumbhakāḥ jina sāsane na vaḍḍhitvā vepulla tam na pāpuṇitvā antarāya iva hīnāya avattanti

original: na ca tesaṁ hīnāyāvattanena jinasāsanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: na ca tesam hīnāya āvattanena jina sāsanam hīḷitam nāma hoti

original: Ye tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū te arahattassa anucchavikā honti.
analyzed: ye tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū te arahattassa anucchavikāḥ honti

original: Kāmadadassāpi, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa ekadesaṁ kakkasaṁ uppajjati, na ca tattha kakkasuppannattā maṇiratanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: kāmadadassa api mahā rāja maṇi ratanassa eka desam kakkasam uppajjati na ca tattha kakkasa uppanna ttā maṇi ratanam hīḷitam nāma hoti

original: Yaṁ tattha parisuddhaṁ maṇiratanassa, taṁ janassa hāsakaraṁ hoti.
analyzed: yam tattha parisuddham maṇi ratanassa tam janassa hāsa karam hoti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jinasāsane pabbajitvā hīnāyāvattanti, kakkasā te jinasāsane papaṭikā, na ca tesaṁ hīnāyāvattanena jinasāsanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te jina sāsane pabbajitvā hīnāya āvattanti kakkasā te jina sāsane papaṭikā na ca tesam hīnāya āvattanena jina sāsanam hīḷitam nāma hoti

original: Ye tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū, te devamanussānaṁ hāsajanakā honti.
analyzed: ye tattha ṭhitāḥ bhikkhū te deva manussānam hāsa janakāḥ honti

original: Jātisampannassapi, mahārāja, lohitacandanassa ekadesaṁ pūtikaṁ hoti appagandhaṁ.
analyzed: jāti sampannassa api mahā rāja lohitacandanassa eka desam pūtikam hoti appa gandha

original: Na tena lohitacandanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: na tena lohita candanam hīḍitam nāma hoti

original: Yaṁ tattha apūtikaṁ sugandhaṁ, taṁ samantā vidhūpeti abhibyāpeti.
analyzed: yam tattha a pūtikam su gandha tam samantā vidhūpeti abhibyāpeti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, ye te jinasāsane pabbajitvā hīnāyāvattanti, te lohitacandanasārantare
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja ye te jina sāsane pabbajitvā hīnāya avattanti te lohita candana sāra antare

original: pūtikadesamiva chaḍḍanīyā jinasāsane, na ca tesaṁ hīnāyāvattanena jinasāsanaṁ hīḷitaṁ nāma hoti.
analyzed: pūtika desam iva chaḍḍanīyāḥ jina sāsane na ca tesam jina sāsanam hīḷitam nāma hoti

original: Ye tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū, te sadevakaṁ lokaṁ sīlavaracandanagandhena anulimpayantī”ti.
analyzed: ye tattha ṭhitāḥ bhikkhū te sa devakam lokam sīlavara candana gandhena anulimpayanti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, tena tena anucchavikena tena tena sadisena kāraṇena niravajjamanupāpitaṁ
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena tena tena anucchavikena tena tena sadisena kāraṇena niravajjam anupāpita

original: jinasāsanaṁ seṭṭhabhāvena paridīpitaṁ, hīnāyāvattamānāpi te jinasāsanassa seṭṭhabhāvaṁyeva paridīpentī”ti.
analyzed: jina sāsanam seṭṭha bhāvena te jina sāsanassa seṭṭha bhāvayā iva paridīpenti iti

original: Hīnāyāvattanapañho pañcamo.
analyzed: hīnāya āvattana pañhaḥ pañcamo
